articles.author: James Pearce
articles.title: Liverpool’s Mac Allister and Szoboszlai show the benefit of early work in the transfer window - The Athletic
articles.description: Liverpool's squad still needs additions but the two midfield signings the club have brought in are already making an impact
articles.content:
With so much talk about the pressing need for further reinforcements, here was a reminder about the injection of quality Jurgen Klopp has already added to his Liverpool squad this summer.

articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Szafnauer hopes “future is bright” for Alpine F1 staff - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Outgoing Alpine Formula 1 team principal Otmar Szafnauer says he hopes that the “future is bright” for the staff members he is leaving behind at Enstone and Viry-Chatillon.
articles.content:
After 18 months in charge of the team, Szafnauer completed his final weekend with Alpine at Spa on Sunday evening, following Friday's announcement of his departure.
